text: Isipe ko si nii sanfaani lodo Allahu afi fun eni ti O ba yonda fun. (Inufu-ayafu ni awon olusipe ati awon olusipe-fun maa wa) titi A oo fi yo ijaya kuro ninu okan won. Won si maa so (fun awon molaika) pe: “Ki ni Oluwa yin so (ni esi isipe)?” Won maa so pe: “Ododo l’O so (isipe yin ti wole. Allahu) Oun l’O ga, O tobi
